Interface DBConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDBConnection

    public interface DBConnection
    Abstracts CRUD interaction with DB Interface for all types of DB connections. All DB connections that implement this interface should use the Singleton Pattern.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getTuple

        JsonObject getTuple(java.lang.String fromRelation,
                    java.lang.String key,
                    java.lang.String delimeter,
                    java.lang.String desiredValue)
        gets tuple with specified value
        Parameters:
        fromRelation - name of first relation in DB
        key - value identifier of tuple of first Relation on which to project
        delimeter - delimiter used with key
        desiredValue - dilimeted value
        Returns:
        JsonObject Jsonified version of tuple

      • getTupleFromJoin

        JsonObject getTupleFromJoin(java.lang.String firstRelation,
                            java.lang.String secondRelation,
                            java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String delimeter,
                            java.lang.String desiredValue)
        gets first relation with specified value and then joins with other relation. Assumes that the foreign key's are of form *foreignTableName*_id
        Parameters:
        firstRelation - name of first relation in DB
        secondRelation - name of second relation in DB
        key - value identifier of tuple of first Relation on which to project
        delimeter - delimiter used with key
        desiredValue - dilimeted value
        Returns:
        JsonObject Jsonified version of tuple
